com.cyc.kb.exception

Class StaleKbObjectException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • com.cyc.kb.exception.KbRuntimeException
            • com.cyc.kb.exception.StaleKbObjectException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class StaleKbObjectException
extends KbRuntimeException
    Thrown when a stale KbObject is passed to a method.

    The KB API factory methods that find or create terms and assertions cache the KB Object they return. Multiple get/findOrCreate requests to the same object will be return the identical underlying object from the cache. The cache can be cleared using KbService.clearCache(), which can be called like so: Cyc.getKbService().clearCache();

    When an object is deleted using Assertion.delete() or KbTerm.delete(), the object is marked "invalid". The validity of the object can be checked using Assertion.isValid() or KbTerm.isValid(), respectively.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • fromThrowable

        public static StaleKbObjectException fromThrowable(Throwable cause)
        Converts a Throwable to a StaleKbObjectException. If the Throwable is a StaleKbObjectException, it will be passed through unmodified; otherwise, it will be wrapped in a new StaleKbObjectException.
        Parameters:
        cause - the Throwable to convert
        Returns:
        a StaleKbObjectException

      • fromThrowable

        public static StaleKbObjectException fromThrowable(String message,
                                                   Throwable cause)
        Converts a Throwable to a StaleKbObjectException with the specified detail message. If the Throwable is a StaleKbObjectException and if the Throwable's message is identical to the one supplied, the Throwable will be passed through unmodified; otherwise, it will be wrapped in a new StaleKbObjectException with the detail message.
        Parameters:
        cause - the Throwable to convert
        message - the specified detail message
        Returns:
        a StaleKbObjectException
